name: Vine Whip
description: You extend a sharp vine to whip the target with. This vine can strike anything within 15 feet of you. Make a melee attack roll, doing 1d6 + MOVE grass damage on a hit.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d12 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.
